Roles.name: Defender
Roles.Description: Allied heroes gain Hybrid DEF. Double bonus for the first 20s for Defenders, and extra Hybrid DEF for the rest of the battle.

2.effect: 6 for all allies, extra 20 for Defenders

4.effect: 12 for all allies, extra 30 for Defenders

6.effect: 24 for all allies, extra 60 for Defenders
